title: Zeitamix Trender 8/30: Donda, Mr. AntiVax, Rand Paul, Drake, Bishop Sycamore, Ed Asner
itunes:title: Zeitamix Trender 8/30: Donda, Mr. AntiVax, Rand Paul, Drake, Bishop Sycamore, Ed Asner
description:
In this edition of Zeitamix Trender, Jack and Miles discuss Kanye's new album 'Donda', 'Mr. AntiVax' dying of COVID, Rand Paul peddling Ivermectin, Drake's incipient album 'Certified Lover Boy', the fake high school team that conned its way onto ESPN, and Ed Asner passing away

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
